sentences.english: Karma today deserves a morning shift change the first night shift.
sentences.chinese: 今日糸早班轉中班噶第一晚。

sentences.english: There's a cinema in East Street.
And established the good partner with the national well-known chemical industry enterprise to close the floss silk.
sentences.chinese: 並與全國知名化工企業建立了良好的合作伙伴關糸。

sentences.chinese: 該糸統採用邏輯決策的方法。

sentences.english: This morning we'll conclude our study of the book of Acts.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上，我們是最後一次有糸統的讀《使徒行傳》。

sentences.english: I hope I can forget, but I know I won't.

definition: to know/to reprimand/to urge/to long for/to tell/to inform
Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
phonetic ga (used in rendering Tibetan and Mongolian sounds)/Tibetan Ge: language of Buddha/(dialect) final particle similar to 了[le5] (esp. in Yunnan)
to squint/what? (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
to not have (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 沒有|没有[mei2 you3]
